Key Match Events: The benches emptied after a double play during the sixth inning in Game 4 of an American League Division baseball playoff series.
Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees and Royals have come to loathe each other over the years, long before this playoff matchup.
Post-Match Reflections: Yankees third baseman Jazz Chisholm Jr. accused the Royals' Maikel Garcia of intentionally trying to hurt Anthony Volpe while sliding into second base during Game 4 of a tense AL Division Series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees jokingly booed Chisholm during a postgame celebration in the visiting clubhouse Thursday night.
Others: The Yankees clinched the AL Division Series with a 3-1 victory over the Royals on Thursday night.
The teams will meet again in the AL Championship Series on Monday night at Yankee Stadium.
